comment.text: This text appears on a button that triggers the download and opening of a report. It's used within a dialog, likely related to user statistics. Translators should ensure the wording accurately conveys the action of both downloading and opening the report.

usage.context:
</ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 className={styles.openReport}
 key="OkButton"
 label={t("DownloadAndOpenReport")}
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
 primary
 onClick={onDownloadAndReport}
 testId="download_and_open_report_button"
 />
